caption: (Video ‚Äì For days like this)

Screenshot of a Messenger chat where the sender offers life advice along with delivery of items; humorous conversation about being prepared.
Photo of a mango wearing reading glasses and reading a book; suggests ordering fruits from Delivery Hobe for intellectual nourishment.
Photograph of a red lighter branded with Delivery Hobe; implies that the service delivers smoking accessories.
Redesigned 100‚Äëtaka banknote featuring a scooter with Delivery Hobe logo replacing Bangabandhu‚Äôs portrait; emphasises the service‚Äôs ubiquity.
Photo of a bus with a caption reminding that minors cannot buy cigarettes; includes a Delivery Hobe logo and note on responsible sales.
Image of a Tic Tac container turned into a small water pipe (bong); caption jokes about multi‚Äëpurpose use; implies Delivery Hobe sells novelty items.
Announcement that Starlink users receive free Delivery Hobe orders; simple graphic with a rocket and Delivery Hobe logo.
Distracted‚Äëboyfriend meme with fruit heads: man (with mango head) looks back at a passing lychee while holding his apple‚Äëheaded partner‚Äôs hand; Delivery Hobe caption emphasises temptation.

Picture of a laptop set up under a banana tree in a field; caption says their new office in Uttara has natural air‚Äëconditioning.
Bright red graphic with a gecko perched on a rock; caption jokes about delivering unusual pets or possibly gecko‚Äëthemed items.
Video‚Äëgame screenshot captioned ‚ÄòWe got DeliveryHobe in Gulshan before GTA6‚Äô; shows an in‚Äëgame store stocked with Delivery Hobe items.

Black‚Äëand‚Äëwhite portrait of Erfan Mahmud with speech bubble: ‚ÄòOrdered Coca-Cola, they delivered Mojo‚Äô; tagline emphasises that Delivery Hobe sometimes substitutes products with local alternatives.
Photo of a Delivery Hobe rider posing beside the newly opened Uttara metro rail; caption celebrates urban progress and their service‚Äôs expansion.
Mother‚Äôs Day conversation screenshot where a mother asks for a gift; the child orders from Delivery Hobe instead; humorous exchange ends with hearts.
Line‚Äëup of bananas of varying sizes labelled by weight; caption suggests ordering the right size for your needs.

Poster titled ‚ÄòOperation Indoor‚Äô featuring a pack of rat glue trap depicted like a military mission; pun on Operation Enduring Freedom; tagline reads ‚ÄòRat glue trap & more now delivery Hobe.‚Äô
Photo of a Sensodyne toothpaste display at a pharmacy; caption notes that even they are selling Sensodyne now; sign behind reads ‚ÄòTangail‚Äô to situate the store.

Poster showing a Google Translate screenshot of ‚ÄòSay no to Smoking‚Äô incorrectly translated; implies translation fails; caption invites viewers to correct it.
